vn.map4d.map4dsdk.annotations

Class MFPolygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • vn.map4d.map4dsdk.annotations.Annotation
      • vn.map4d.map4dsdk.annotations.MFPolygon

  • public class MFPolygon
extends Annotation
    A polygon on the earth's surface. A polygon can be convex or concave, it may span the 180 meridian and it can have holes that are not filled in.

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getPoints

        public java.util.List<LatLng> getPoints()

      • getHoles

        public java.util.List<java.util.List<LatLng>> getHoles()
        Returns a snapshot of the holes of this polygon at this time . The list returned is a copy of the list of holes and so changes to the polygon's holes will not be reflected by this list, nor will changes to this list be reflected by the polygon.
        Returns:
